name: Defense TV
tag_list: defense, technology, marketing, aerospace, space, defenseservicesmarketingcouncil, dsmc, dubai, abu-dhabi, uae, worldwide, security, sponsoring, cyber-security
description: TV for Defense, Space & Security Market
overview:
DTV will be the only 24/7 Defense, Aerospace and Security industry focused television station worldwide.

DTV will the most important marketing platform for the Defense Industry

DTV will become a must carry program in many parts of the world when the 24/7 station is launched in February 2013 at IDEX 2013 in Abu Dhabi, UAE

DTV will be the biggest Defense medium in the world.

DTV will be one of the best distributed TV channels worldwide.

DTV is fast and informative while being powerful and entertaining in both Arabic & English.

DTV will ultimately be present in 200+ countries on 6 continents.
